name: Henry's Caravan
description:
A 2-minute Shoot 'em up game made in Godot Engine

Rushed af because conscription (gameplay is pre much complete but lacks any kind of audio)

Unbindable Controls you should know:

  • Start: Space
  • Reset: ESC
  • Rebind Controls: F1
  • Reset High Scores: F2

Gameplay Tips:

  • Next wave spawns when you kill all enemies in current wave
  • Next wave is overwritten with the boss when 30 seconds remain
  • Extends come in items & 2ups replace in 1ups if you are on your last life
  • Hold bomb button to send it further
  • Medals come in 100~900 - 1000~9000 - 10000
  • Next medal depends on the last one you collected
  • Dropping a medal will reset the next medal to 100
  • Take a hit to make items bounce up

Source (if anyone is interested): https://github.com/Xx-Henry-xX/Henry-s-Caravan
